body_html:
Ok, should I update this PR accordingly to do the mapping tonight @ramonh ?

For the dumps: Heroku's Postgres plugin / extension or however they call it does pg dumps already. I'm not sure for how long they're stored thought... For storing a yearly dump on our side, what about just an additional private archive repo? (cc @alicetragedy )

body:
Ok, should I update this PR accordingly to do the mapping tonight @ramonh ?

For the dumps: Heroku's Postgres plugin / extension or however they call it does pg dumps already. I'm not sure for how long they're stored thought... For storing a yearly dump on our side, what about just an additional private `archive` repo? (cc @alicetragedy )
